scripts.create-arbg: graph create marlinprotocol/enclaves-arb-goerli subgraph-arbg.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
scripts.remove-arbg: graph remove marlinprotocol/enclaves-arb-goerli subgraph-arbg.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
scripts.deploy-arbg: graph deploy marlinprotocol/enclaves-arb-goerli subgraph-arbg.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
